name: template-mern-app
description: Template for a full-stack MERN app

scripts.test: cd server && npm test & cd ../client && npm test
scripts.format: cd server && npm run format & cd ../client && npm run format
scripts.i-ncu: npm i && ncu && ncu -u && npm i
scripts.install-all: npm i && cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm run i
scripts.install-update: npm run i-ncu && cd server && npm run i-ncu && cd ../client && npm run i-ncu
